TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageSpan extends Android.Text.Style.DynamicDrawableSpan

Docs.summary: Span that replaces the text it's attached to with a Drawable that can be aligned with the bottom or with the baseline of the surrounding text.
